name: Sheep-O-Block
description:
Sheep-O-Block is a funny puzzle game.

The aim of the game is to clear the board in given time, level per level. Two or more sheep of the same colour, placed next to or on top of each other, will dissolve. During a level you can shake the device 3x so the sheep will be shuffled.

Main features of Sheep-O-Block are:
★ 20 Levels on iPhone, iPod touch
★ 24 Levels on iPad
★ 8 different game colors
★ Funny sheep animations
★ Funny sheep sounds
★ Choose between day and night background
★ Game Center support for leaderboard
★ Local statistics
